page.title: 05Ravensbank First School.
page.content: In our 12km block there are 9{First {Schools}for 5-9 year olds, 3{Middle {Schools}for the 9-13 age group and 1 {High School}for 13-18 year olds. {Ravensbank First School}is a new open-plan building. There are 320 children and 11 teachers. We wear {uniform}of grey trousers or skirts, blue shirts, blue jumpers with a blue and silver tie. In summer the girls wear blue and white dresses. There is a hall for assembly and P.E., 2 libraries, a staffroom, office and toilets. We work from 9am. to 12 noon with one break. At{lunchtime,}ladies supervise us while we eat our packed lunches. At 1.15pm. it's back to work until 3.15pm. Some days there are {clubs}like recorders, art and sewing until 4pm. We have 3 computers. Our school is a happy place where we learn lots of different things.
